metadata.title: Clean Metrics Studio - Comprehensive KPI Library
metadata.description: A comprehensive library of 325 Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) used across major industries

financial_services.name: Financial Services
financial_services.description: KPIs for banking, insurance, investment, and financial institutions

kpis.name: Net Interest Margin (NIM)
kpis.formula: (Interest Income - Interest Expense) / Average Earning Assets

kpis.name: Liquidity Coverage Ratio (LCR)
kpis.formula: High-Quality Liquid Assets / Net Cash Outflows

kpis.name: Net Stable Funding Ratio (NSFR)
kpis.formula: Available Stable Funding / Required Stable Funding

kpis.name: Earnings Per Share (EPS)
kpis.formula: (Net Income - Preferred Dividends) / Weighted Average Shares Outstanding

kpis.name: Price-to-Earnings Ratio (P/E)
kpis.formula: Market Price per Share / Earnings per Share

kpis.name: Dividend Yield
kpis.formula: Annual Dividends per Share / Price per Share

kpis.name: Book Value per Share
kpis.formula: (Total Equity - Preferred Equity) / Total Shares Outstanding

kpis.name: Customer Acquisition Cost (CAC)
kpis.formula: Total Sales & Marketing Cost / New Customers Acquired

kpis.name: Customer Lifetime Value (CLV)
kpis.formula: Average Revenue per Customer × Average Customer Lifespan

kpis.name: Cross-Sell Ratio
kpis.formula: Number of Products / Number of Customers

manufacturing.name: Manufacturing
manufacturing.description: KPIs for production, quality control, and manufacturing operations

kpis.name: Mean Time Between Failures (MTBF)
kpis.formula: Total Operating Time / Number of Failures

kpis.name: Mean Time to Repair (MTTR)
kpis.formula: Total Repair Time / Number of Repairs

kpis.name: Changeover Time
kpis.formula: Time from last good part to first good part

kpis.name: Inventory Turnover
kpis.formula: Cost of Goods Sold / Average Inventory

kpis.name: On-Time Delivery (OTD)
kpis.formula: Orders Delivered On Time / Total Orders

retail_ecommerce.name: Retail & E-commerce
retail_ecommerce.description: KPIs for retail stores, online shopping, and omnichannel commerce

kpis.name: Same-Store Sales Growth
kpis.formula: (Current Period Sales - Prior Period Sales) / Prior Period Sales

kpis.name: Units per Transaction (UPT)
kpis.formula: Total Units Sold / Number of Transactions

kpis.name: Inventory Turn Rate
kpis.formula: Cost of Goods Sold / Average Inventory

kpis.name: Customer Lifetime Value (CLV)
kpis.formula: Average Purchase Value × Purchase Frequency × Customer Lifespan

healthcare.name: Healthcare
healthcare.description: KPIs for hospitals, clinics, healthcare systems, and medical practices

kpis.name: Emergency Department Wait Time
kpis.formula: Average time from arrival to treatment

kpis.name: Patient Wait Time
kpis.formula: Average time from check-in to provider

kpis.name: Operating Room Utilization
kpis.formula: Actual Surgery Time / Available OR Time

kpis.name: Case Mix Index (CMI)
kpis.formula: Sum of DRG Weights / Total Discharges

kpis.name: Nurse Turnover Rate
kpis.formula: Nurses Who Left / Average Nurse Headcount

technology_saas.name: Technology & SaaS
technology_saas.description: KPIs for software companies, SaaS platforms, and technology businesses

kpis.name: Monthly Recurring Revenue (MRR)
kpis.formula: Sum of all monthly subscription revenue

kpis.name: Net Revenue Retention (NRR)
kpis.formula: (Beginning MRR + Expansion - Contraction - Churn) / Beginning MRR

kpis.name: Customer Lifetime Value (LTV)
kpis.formula: ARPU × Gross Margin × Average Customer Lifetime

kpis.name: LTV to CAC Ratio
kpis.formula: Customer Lifetime Value / Customer Acquisition Cost

kpis.name: DAU/MAU Ratio (Stickiness)
kpis.formula: Daily Active Users / Monthly Active Users

kpis.name: Time to Value (TTV)
kpis.formula: Time from signup to first value realization

kpis.name: Quick Ratio (SaaS)
kpis.formula: (New MRR + Expansion MRR) / (Churned MRR + Contraction MRR)

kpis.name: Burn Rate
kpis.formula: Monthly Cash Expenses - Monthly Cash Revenue

kpis.name: Magic Number
kpis.formula: (Current Quarter ARR - Previous Quarter ARR) / Previous Quarter Sales & Marketing Spend

kpis.name: Net Dollar Retention
kpis.formula: (Starting ARR + Expansion - Contraction - Churn) / Starting ARR

energy_utilities.name: Energy & Utilities
energy_utilities.description: KPIs for power generation, renewable energy, oil & gas, and utility companies

kpis.name: Heat Rate
kpis.formula: Fuel Energy Input / Electrical Energy Output

kpis.name: System Average Interruption Duration Index (SAIDI)
kpis.formula: Total Duration of Interruptions / Total Customers

kpis.name: System Average Interruption Frequency Index (SAIFI)
kpis.formula: Total Number of Interruptions / Total Customers

kpis.name: Forced Outage Rate
kpis.formula: Forced Outage Hours / (Service Hours + Forced Outage Hours)

kpis.name: Cost per kWh
kpis.formula: Total Operating Cost / Total kWh Sold

kpis.name: Energy Theft Rate
kpis.formula: Estimated Stolen Energy / Total Energy Supplied

supply_chain_logistics.name: Supply Chain & Logistics
supply_chain_logistics.description: KPIs for warehousing, transportation, procurement, and supply chain management

kpis.name: Perfect Order Rate
kpis.formula: (On-Time × In-Full × Damage-Free × Accurate) Orders / Total Orders

kpis.name: On-Time In-Full (OTIF)
kpis.formula: Orders Delivered Complete and On Time / Total Orders

kpis.name: Order Cycle Time
kpis.formula: Time from Order Placement to Delivery

kpis.name: Inventory Turnover
kpis.formula: Cost of Goods Sold / Average Inventory Value

kpis.name: Days of Supply
kpis.formula: Inventory on Hand / Average Daily Usage

kpis.name: Stockout Rate
kpis.formula: Out of Stock Items / Total SKUs

kpis.name: Warehouse Capacity Utilization
kpis.formula: Used Storage Space / Total Storage Space

kpis.name: Putaway Efficiency
kpis.formula: Units Put Away / Putaway Labor Hours

kpis.name: Truck Utilization
kpis.formula: Used Truck Capacity / Total Truck Capacity

kpis.name: Supplier Lead Time
kpis.formula: Average time from PO to receipt

kpis.name: Supplier On-Time Delivery
kpis.formula: On-Time Supplier Deliveries / Total Supplier Deliveries

kpis.name: Supplier Defect Rate
kpis.formula: Defective Units from Supplier / Total Units Received

kpis.name: Purchase Order Cycle Time
kpis.formula: Time from PO Creation to PO Approval

kpis.name: Cash-to-Cash Cycle Time
kpis.formula: Inventory Days + Receivable Days - Payable Days

human_resources.name: Human Resources
human_resources.description: KPIs for workforce management, talent acquisition, and employee engagement

kpis.name: Time to Fill
kpis.formula: Days from Job Posting to Offer Acceptance

kpis.name: Time to Hire
kpis.formula: Days from Application to Offer Acceptance

kpis.name: Cost per Hire
kpis.formula: Total Recruiting Costs / Number of Hires

kpis.name: Labor Cost Percentage
kpis.formula: Total Labor Costs / Total Operating Costs

kpis.name: Gender Pay Gap
kpis.formula: (Male Avg Pay - Female Avg Pay) / Male Avg Pay

marketing_sales.name: Marketing & Sales
marketing_sales.description: KPIs for marketing campaigns, sales performance, and revenue generation

kpis.name: Sales Cycle Length
kpis.formula: Average days from first contact to close

kpis.name: Pipeline Value
kpis.formula: Sum of all opportunity values in pipeline

customer_service.name: Customer Service
customer_service.description: KPIs for customer support, contact centers, and service quality

kpis.name: First Response Time (FRT)
kpis.formula: Time from ticket creation to first response

kpis.name: Average Handle Time (AHT)
kpis.formula: (Talk Time + Hold Time + After Call Work) / Total Calls

kpis.name: First Contact Resolution (FCR)
kpis.formula: Issues Resolved on First Contact / Total Contacts

kpis.name: Average Wait Time
kpis.formula: Total Wait Time / Total Calls Answered

kpis.name: Service Level
kpis.formula: Calls Answered within Target / Total Calls

real_estate.name: Real Estate
real_estate.description: KPIs for property management, real estate investment, and development

kpis.name: Cash-on-Cash Return
kpis.formula: Annual Pre-Tax Cash Flow / Total Cash Invested

kpis.name: Internal Rate of Return (IRR)
kpis.formula: Discount rate that makes NPV zero

kpis.name: Gross Rent Multiplier (GRM)
kpis.formula: Property Price / Annual Gross Rental Income

kpis.name: Average Lease Term
kpis.formula: Sum of Lease Terms / Number of Leases

kpis.name: Make-Ready Time
kpis.formula: Average days to prepare unit for new tenant

kpis.name: Work Order Completion Time
kpis.formula: Average time to complete work orders

kpis.name: Absorption Rate
kpis.formula: Units Sold per Month / Total Available Units

telecommunications.name: Telecommunications
telecommunications.description: KPIs for telecom operators, network providers, and communication services

kpis.name: Coverage Area
kpis.formula: Area with network signal / Total target area

kpis.name: Blended ARPU
kpis.formula: Weighted average of prepaid and postpaid ARPU

kpis.name: First Call Resolution
kpis.formula: Issues Resolved on First Call / Total Calls

project_management.name: Project Management
project_management.description: KPIs for project delivery, resource management, and program performance

kpis.name: On-Time Completion Rate
kpis.formula: Projects Completed On Time / Total Projects

kpis.name: On-Budget Completion Rate
kpis.formula: Projects Completed On Budget / Total Projects
